data.text: @rjh62200 @mercuriobryan @tripperhead Typically one will act as supervisor to manage household affairs and the staff. 1 or 2 specializing in cooking or cleaning. 1 or 2 as primary care for elderly or young children. All on rotating shifts and days off so there is 24/7 coverage. The wealthy are different yo.
@tripperhead He should go and try out the concentration camp
